ref.mixed-citation:
Zhu N
,
Zhang D
,
Wang W
A novel coronavirus from patients with pneumonia in China, 2019. N. Engl. J. Med. 382( 8), 727– 733 ( 2020). 31978945

note.p: •• A previously unknown β-coronavirus (CoV) was discovered through the use of unbiased sequencing in samples from patients with pneumonia. A novel CoV isolated from human airway epithelial cells, called 2019-nCoV, formed another clade within the subgenus sarbecovirus, Orthocoronavirinae subfamily.
